customer_name: T. B. Holdings L L C
narrative:
This was a focused inspection to look at veterinary care issues cited on the last inspection. 
The following animals were observed, and are receiving appropriate veterinary care:
     Dogs - CABCHZ, CACCGY, and CAHCZT
     Sheep - 995
No non-compliant items were identified during this inspection. 
 
An exit interview was conducted with facility representatives.
